title: Machine Learning Modeling of Anticancer Peptides
questions: Which machine learning (ML) algorithm is superior in classifying anticancer peptides (ACPs) and non-anticancer peptides (non-ACPs)?
objectives: Learn, how to calculate peptide descriptor
Learn, how to create training data set from features?
Assessment of best ML algorithm in predicting anticancer peptide

workflows.name: PeptideML
workflows.title: PeptideML
